Package com.ac.games.rest.controller

These classes are the controllers designed to handle REST messaging for the various service offerings supported by the Terrapin Collection Manager service.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutocompleteController
    This class should be the intercepter for REST service access for any Autocomplete fields.
    BGGDataController
    This class should be the intercepter for REST service access to the BoardGameGeek game information.
    CollectionAddController  
    CollectionController
    This class should be the intercepter for REST service access to the core Game information.
    CollectionItemController  
    CSIDataController
    This class should be the intercepter for REST service access to the CoolStuffInc game information.
    GameController
    This class should be the intercepter for REST service access to the core Game information.
    GameReltnController
    This class should be the intercepter for REST service access to the core Game information.
    LoginController  
    MMDataController
    This class should be the intercepter for REST service access to the MiniatureMarket game information.
    RecommendController  
    SearchController
    This class is the interceptor for REST service access to searching content via dynamic queries
    StatsController
    This class should be the intercepter for REST service access to the stats information.
    UserController  
    WishListController
    This class should be the intercepter for REST service access to the wishlist information information.

Package com.ac.games.rest.controller Description

These classes are the controllers designed to handle REST messaging for the various service offerings supported by the Terrapin Collection Manager service.

At this time the following services URLs are planned:

  • /external/bggdata
  • /external/csidata
  • /external/mmdata
  • /external/awsdata
  • /gamereltn
  • /game
  • /user
  • /search
  • /collection
  • /collection/item
  • /wishlist
  • /notification
  • /mediaitem
